Rulings.Tengu:
●The effect of Royal Keeper is not a Flip Effect.
●When a face-down Royal Keeper is attacked and flipped face-up, its +300 ATK effect is applied AFTER damage calculation.
●When your opponent activates Bottomless Trap Hole against Royal Keeper, the +300 ATK effect of Royal Keeper resolves after Bottomless Trap Hole.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Royal Keeper" is not a Flip Effect.\n2. When a face-down "Royal Keeper" is attacked and flipped face-up, its +300 ATK effect is applied AFTER damage calculation.\n3. When your opponent activates "Bottomless Trap Hole" against "Royal Keeper", the +300 ATK effect of "Royal Keeper" resolves after "Bottomless Trap Hole".
